title: 98/716/EC: Commission Decision of 3 December 1998 amending Decision 97/432/EC on a Community financial contribution for a surveillance programme relating to the eradication of foot-and-mouth disease in Albania, Federal Republic of Yugoslavia and Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia (notified under document number C(1998) 3747) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 3 December 1998 amending Decision 97/432/EC on a Community financial contribution for a surveillance programme relating to the eradication of foot-and-mouth disease in Albania, Federal Republic of Yugoslavia and Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia (notified under document number C(1998) 3747) (Text with EEA relevance) (98/716/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In the second indent of Article 2 of Decision 97/432/EC the word 'six` is replaced by the word 'twelve`.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 December 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 224, 18. 8. 1990, p. 19.
(2) OJ L 168, 2. 7. 1994, p. 31.
(3) OJ L 185, 15. 7. 1997, p. 15.
